What We Offer

Friendly tech services to keep your business running smoothly

Ongoing Tech Help

Get fast help when your tools, email, or Wi-Fi aren’t working.

Cloud Setup

We set up Google Drive, OneDrive, or Dropbox so your files are easy to find and share.

Security & Backups

Antivirus and weekly backups to keep your data and devices safe.

Website Help

We make sure your site runs fast, stays online, and keeps your leads flowing.

Automations

We connect your forms, calendars, emails, and CRMs so things happen automatically.

AI Tools

Get smart digests, email drafts, and summaries of your leads — no extra typing.

SEO Visibility

We help your business show up better on Google to attract local customers.

Workstation Setup

We set up your computer or device so it’s secure and ready to work.

24/7 Monitoring & Maintenance

We keep watch on your tech around the clock and fix issues before they cause problems.

📅 Book a Free 30-Min IT Audit

Meet Larinni

Founder of 705Digital

I'm Larinni — a software engineer, former IT instructor at Cambrian College, and systems analyst at Glencore. I’ve spent over 10 years helping businesses make technology work for them.

I created 705Digital to support women-led businesses and service providers with modern, reliable, and non-overwhelming IT support.

📍 Based in Sudbury · Serving clients across Ontario and beyond

All plans are tailored for small businesses that want less tech stress and more time to focus on what they do best.

For solo business owners 👩‍💼 who need reliable tech support and peace of mind.
